content.question: A. Describe TWO ways that Image 1 illustrates the concept of intensive agriculture. B. Explain how the Green Revolution led to higher yields of potato crops. C. Explain why the agricultural practice shown in Image 1 is associated with lower levels of pesticide and fertilizer use. D. Explain the degree to which the practice of mixed crop farming may be economically advantageous to farmers. E. Explain how small family farms growing potatoes in developing countries can be integrated into a complex commodity chain.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 4.E: Explain how maps, images, and landscapes illustrate, or relate to geographic principles, processes, and outcomes.
